name: SpeedSong
description:
A tiny speedrunning platformer made in a week, to challenge myself!

Play as a little boombox that must reach the finish line as fast as possible!

Picking up music notes pauses the timer for a few seconds, so make sure to use that to your advantage!

Controls:

A / D - Left / Right
Space - Jump
R - Restart stage
Escape - Go back to main menu

Be careful not to clip through the walls, or else you'll end up... somewhere weird

Notes:

- The player can be controlled with a controller, but can't interact with buttons/restart the stage/go back to the main menu via keys
